content: this design was worked up using #4 medium worsted weight acrylic yarn and using a 3 0mm hook any weight yarn and appropriate hook can be used my finished item measures about 7 from nose to tail this pattern is available to view and use for free on my blog please only share links and do not redistribute the pattern i do not claim any ownership of the long dog character and am offering the pattern for free to avoid profiting from intellectual property infringement this pattern has not been tested
